Material.Name: material
Material.Components: the powder of a crushed black pearl worth at least 500 gp

Spell.Name: Circle of Death
Spell.Description: A sphere of negative energy ripples out in a 60-footradius sphere from a point within range. Each creature in that area must make a Constitution saving throw. A target takes 8d6 necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Description.Name: At Higher Levels
Description.Text: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the damage increases by 2d6 for each slot level above 6th.
